name: jimmies
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
very small pieces of coloured sugar or chocolate used as a decoration on the top of cakes, etc.: Scatter some jimmies over the cupcakes before serving. Jimmies are often chocolate sprinkles, but the word can be used for any kind of sprinkles.
More examplesFewer examplesFor me, a doughnut isn't a doughnut if it doesn't have jimmies on top.Jimmies are really just decorative but they can add some texture and of course some extra sweetness.I always keep a tub of jimmies on my kitchen shelf.
